_comment: Pyright configuration for OM1. Type checking covers application code (src/) and tests/. See decision rationale below.
_exclude_rationale: system_hw_test: hardware-specific test scripts with minimal type coverage. unitree, ubtech: vendor robot SDK directories with untyped external dependencies. Excluding these avoids type errors in vendored code while maintaining coverage of core application logic.
_typeCheckingMode_rationale: Set to 'standard' (not 'strict') as a pragmatic choice for large Python projects with gradual type adoption. Strict mode is a medium-term goal, not an oversight. Strict mode migration tracked separately to avoid blocking development on type-only issues. Current mode catches undefined names (F) and basic type mismatches while remaining contributor-friendly.
_reportMissingImports_rationale: Reports missing imports as warnings (not errors), catching obvious import issues without failing CI on transitive untyped dependencies.
